page.title: 03HOUSING Melton Ross / Elsham
page.content:
HOUSES; Melton Highwood Farmhouse; divided into 2 houses, a) farmer and wife. b) farmworker's widow. Foreman's house; farmworker & family Cottage; farmworker. Cottage; farmworker & family. Jackson's Top Farm Cottage; farmworker & gardener Dodds Top Farm Cottage; farmworker. Moor Farm Cottage; farmworker & wife.
FARM STORAGE; Most of the farms have a corn drier and store and a potato store.Some have a potato chitting shed. They all have storage for machinery, fertilisers and chemicals, also a workshop on some of the farms.
